# Cosmic structure, gravity tests, and the beautiful mess of the Universe

I am Wojtek Hellwing, cosmologist at CFT PAN in Warsaw. I study the Cosmic Web, peculiar velocities, and beyond-ΛCDM models, building simulations and statistics that stress test gravity.
